contexts.context: "But what about the <mark>competition</mark>?" my admirers ask.
The <mark>competition</mark> is the Camonna Tong. And you don't want to join...
...retainers, and clients have entered whole-heartedly into the <mark>competition</mark> to control and exploit Vvardenfell's land and resources, building towers...
...The councilors blame local corruption, weakened enforcement, and aggressive <mark>competition</mark> between the Thieves Guild and the Camonna Tong.
.... Those reluctant to prove their worthiness by killing off the <mark>competition</mark>, and those uncomfortable about competing in such a ruthless atmosphere...
...unfortunate disturbances of the public peace resulting from the increasingly aggressive <mark>competition</mark> between the Thieves Guild and the Camonna Tong for control of...
